text: Agnaldo Timóteo Pereira (October 16, 1936 – April 3, 2021) was a Brazilian bolero singer-songwriter and politician. He was born in Caratinga, Minas Gerais. He was a member of the Progressistas and 2006 Liberal Party. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1983 until 1987 and again from 1995 until 1997. Timóteo died in Rio de Janeiro from COVID-19 on April 3, 2021 at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Minas Gerais Category:Brazilian singer-songwriters Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Rio de Janeiro
title: Agnaldo Timóteo
